Key Match Events: L. Traoré scored two goals for Burkina Faso in the 35th and 38th minutes
H. Bandé scored a penalty for Burkina Faso in the 60th minute
Z. Nkhoma scored a goal for Malawi in the 80th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Stade 26 Mars
Others: The half-time score was 2-0 in favor of Burkina Faso
S. Simporé and C. Badolo provided assists for Burkina Faso's goals
C. Kaonga provided the assist for Malawi's goal
The final score was 3-1 in favor of Burkina Faso
